name: Sumi Sakurasawa (Kanojo, Okarishimasu) LoRA
description:
2. Kanojo, Okarishimasu model. ❤

Sumi Sakurasawa LoRA.

Using red hair as a prompt can help to get closer to Sumis look.

Works well with a weight around 0.6-0.8.

Got some really nice results with MeinaMix.
But it works great on other models too. Would love reviews and see what can be generated with this.

NSFW works pretty well too.
